Wed., Oct. 25: Preparing for the 2018 legislative session
  


Webinar:
Criminal Justice Reform

Wednesday, October 25
6 - 6:30 p.m.
Online Webinar

RSVP By Email
Share this:           

Fight for a better Mississippi!

We continue our Wednesday Webinar Series on Wednesday, October 25 with a session on criminal justice reform. Learn about the initiatives we will push during the 2018 legislative session. Plus find out how you can help us lobby for measures, such as a statewide body camera policy for law enforcement and written consent to search.

This week's topics include:

  • Police accountability
  • Decarceration
  • How to help us in the Mississippi State Legislature

Tune in next Wednesday, October 25 at 6 p.m. to learn about our efforts to reform the criminal justice system in Mississippi! RSVP by emailing bfeldman@aclu-ms.org.

Save the date for this upcoming webinar:

  • November 1: LGBTQ rights

Let's fight for a more just and equitable Mississippi!
